issue.title: [R][CI] Pin test-r-devdocs on Windows to R 4.1
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16375](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16375). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This build is failing on Windows (https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/tree/nightly-tests-2022-04-27-0-github-test-r-devdocs), likely because R 4.2 on Windows requires UCRT.  A short-term solution is pinning these builds to R 4.1
